title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Riggs Spring Group Site
body: Riggs Spring Group Site       This site is on the Riggs Spring Loop 3.6 miles (6 km) from Rainbow Point and .3 miles (.5 km) from the Riggs Spring Campsite. Most of the time, the stream bed next to the Group Site is dry. Reliable water is available at Riggs Spring which is next to the Riggs Spring Campsite. There are Ponderosa Pines and Juniper trees at the site. Datum WGS 84, 37 26 58.0 N, 112 14 17.7 W. Altitude 7483 feet (2281 m).
